name: Professional House Cleaning
description: Comprehensive cleaning service for your entire home. Our professionals will leave your space sparkling clean, covering kitchens, bathrooms, bedrooms, and living areas.

name: Garden Landscaping
description: Transform your outdoor space with our expert landscaping services. We offer design, planting, and maintenance to create the garden of your dreams.

name: Personal Fitness Training
description: Achieve your fitness goals with a certified personal trainer. We provide customized workout plans and one-on-one sessions tailored to your needs.

name: Mobile Car Wash & Detailing
description: We come to you! Our mobile service includes a full exterior wash, interior vacuuming, and detailed cleaning to make your car look brand new.

name: Expert Tutoring (Math & Science)
description: Personalized tutoring sessions for students of all ages. Our experienced tutors help build confidence and improve grades in Math and Science.

name: Plumbing & Fixture Repair
description: Leaky faucet or clogged drain? Our certified plumbers provide fast and reliable repair services for all your plumbing needs.

name: Pet Grooming & Care
description: Pamper your pets with our grooming and care services. We offer bathing, trimming, nail clipping, and more for dogs and cats.

name: Home Appliance Repair
description: Quick and reliable repair for all major home appliances including refrigerators, washing machines, and ovens.

name: Photography Session
description: Capture your special moments with a professional photography session. Perfect for weddings, birthdays, and family portraits.

name: IT Support & Troubleshooting
description: Get expert help for your computer, network, and software issues. Remote and onsite support available.
